trans-unit.source: Provides information about an imaging codec.

A BitmapCodecInfo can be obtain for each codec in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder.CodecInfo%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder.CodecInfo%2A> properties.
Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo"></xref>.
Gets a value that identifies the author of the codec.
The author of the codec.
Gets a value that identifies the container format for the codec.
The container format of the codec.
Gets a value that identifies the device manufacturer of the codec.
The device manufacturer of the codec.
Gets a value that identifies the device models of the codec.
The device model of the codec.
Gets a value that identifies the file extensions associated with the codec.
The file extensions associated with the codec.
Gets a value that represents the friendly name of the codec.
The friendly name of the codec.
Gets a value that identifies the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] associated with the codec.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] types associated with the codec.
Gets a value that identifies the specification version of the codec.
The specification version of the codec.
Gets a value that indicates whether the codec supports animation.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the codec supports animation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the codec supports lossless of images.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the codec supports lossless of images; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that identifies whether the codec supports multiple frames.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the codec supports multiple frames; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that identifies the version of the codec.
The version of the codec.
